name: sdi-exam-registration-form
description: SDI成都奥德考试中心报名表 - 在线报名系统

scripts.version:patch: npm version patch -m "chore: bump version to %s"
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor -m "feat: bump version to %s"
scripts.version:major: npm version major -m "chore: bump version to %s [BREAKING CHANGE]"

author: xuezaideguo <skee.chen@xuezaideguo.com>
